td.content: s:a M hosier aged 57 yrs presents with severe difficulty reading, severe poor night vision, Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. patient also reports of severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye. he denies drinking alcohol he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life o:Height 187 cm, Weight 64.1 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15, Multifocal Electroretinography (+) Multifocal deficiencies of maculae on ERG a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:administered vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, performed Multifocal Electroretinography, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:male aged 58 yrs complains of severe difficulty reading x 2 days. NKDA. o:Height 187 cm, Weight 63.9 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

s:58 yr old m hosier c/o 10 days h/o severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye. NKDA. Patient does not smoke Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 188 cm, Weight 66.1 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, and ordered retinal cell transplantation - Left eye.
